title: Panel API Keys
description: Manage your API keys for REST API and WebSocket panel access
experimental: Experimental feature. Documentation not yet available.

about.title: About Panel API Keys
about.description: Panel API keys allow you to access the BlockMine panel API and WebSocket for automation and integrations. Keys inherit your user permissions by default.
about.security: Security: Treat API keys like passwords. Never share them publicly or add them to version control.

table.title: Your API Keys
table.name: Name
table.empty: No API keys. Create one to get started.

createDialog.title: Create New API Key
createDialog.description: Choose a descriptive name for your API key

createdDialog.title: API Key Successfully Created!
createdDialog.description: Make sure to copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again!
createdDialog.warning: This is the only time you'll see this key. Copy it now!

messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key? This action is irreversible.
